entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is a student at Hogwarts who is friends with Harry and Hermione. She is described as positively beaming when talking to Hermione, indicating that she feels guilty for laughing at her in Transfiguration class.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who is friends with Harry and Parvati. She is described as beaming back at Parvati, indicating that she has forgiven her for laughing at her in Transfiguration class.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts who is friends with Harry and Hermione. He is described as surfacing after making a noise like a plunger being withdrawn from a blocked sink.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is a student at Hogwarts who is mentioned as being ignored by Hermione when she talks to Parvati.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is the head of the Potions department at Hogwarts. He is hosting a party that Parvati and Hermione are interested in attending.

entities.name: cormac
entities.description: Cormac is a person who is mentioned as being met by Hermione at eight o'clock to attend Professor Slughorn's party.
